author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE MOVING NORTHWARD TOWARD KURE AND MIDWAY ATOLLS...
summary:
...HONE MOVING NORTHWARD TOWARD KURE AND MIDWAY ATOLLS...
 As of 2:00 AM HST Sun Sep 1
 the center of Hone was located near 24.7, -176.4
 with movement N at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
